post.title: iphone 4, 32gb, bnib (still sealed), factory unlocked - $1150
post.content: i think the title says it all; these things are sold out all over the city and i had to wait for hours to get one. iphone 4, brand new, still in the sealed box and factory unlocked. comes with receipt and 1 full year of apple care (purchased today, july 31) local face-to-face deals only (mississauga / gta), $1150
